Description: * Respawn time at 20min reduced from 50s to 45s (was 40s previous patch)
* {{PageRef|Ivy}}: {{PageRef|Kudzu Bomb}} damage spirit scaling reduced from 0.7 to 0.6
* {{PageRef|Ivy}}: {{PageRef|Kudzu Bomb}} T3 damage reduced from +60 to +50
* {{PageRef|Ivy}}: {{PageRef|Kudzu Bomb}} vertical radius is now a fixed 2m pancake shape instead of the full radius of the ability
* {{PageRef|Ivy}}: {{PageRef|Air Drop}} explosion now respects line of sight
* {{PageRef|Mirage}}: {{PageRef|Tornado}} time for victims to reach max height reduced from 0.3s to 0.2s
* {{PageRef|Mirage}}: Fixed {{PageRef|Tornado}} being castable while busy (such as while channeling {{PageRef|Traveler}})
* {{PageRef|Mirage}}: {{PageRef|Djinn's Mark}} T1 now only applies the slow when the multiplier is 2x or higher
* {{PageRef|Mirage}}: {{PageRef|Djinn's Mark}} damage is now treated as a DoT in terms of {{PageRef|Zipline|alt_name=zipline}} rules (doesn't prevent ziplining or knock you off)
* {{PageRef|Mirage}}: Fixed {{PageRef|Djinn's Mark}} applying bullet procs with {{PageRef|Return Fire}}
* {{PageRef|Pocket}}: Fixed {{PageRef|Mystic Reverb}} causing {{PageRef|Affliction}} damage be lethal
* Fixed certain player name lengths not being reportable
